Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.logs

Class BaseLog

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.logs.BaseLog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Log, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.comparison.Filtered<LogEntry>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.io.Closeable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.io.Flushable<Duration>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Operation, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Stoppable<Duration>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseTextLog
public abstract class BaseLog extends Object implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Stoppable<Duration>, Log
Base class for log implementations. Handles background queueing of log entries. By default, logging is asynchronous. To make logging synchronous (for example, when debugging), set the property KIVAKIT_LOG_SYNCHRONOUS to false.

Configuration

  • logs()
  • level(Severity)
  • Log.maximumFlushTime()
  • maximumStopTime()

  • name()
  • log(LogEntry)
  • clear()

  • asynchronous(boolean)
  • start()
  • stop(Duration)
  • isRunning()

Logging

More details about logging are available in kivakit-core.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
